briefTitle: Peri-gravidic Exposure to Endocrine Disrupting Persistent Organic Pollutants
officialTitle: Peri-gravidic Exposure to Endocrine Disrupting Persistent Organic Pollutants Dioxins and Dioxin-like Dioxins and the Development of Breast Cancer Within 15 Years: Prospective Longitudinal Case-control Study
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of women who had pre- and per-gravidic exposure and who developped a breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women who have given birth 2002/2005
* collection of cord blood during childbirth
* woman who developed invasive or non-invasive breast cancer in the following years (2005- O6/2018)

Exclusion Criteria:

* 0
